edu.uidaho.junicon.interpreter.interpreter

Class AbstractSubstrate

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uidaho.junicon.interpreter.interpreter.AbstractSubstrate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScriptEval, ISubstrate

    public class AbstractSubstrate
extends Object
implements ISubstrate
    Base class for the underlying substrate that executes scripts. The substrate either uses a Java ScriptEngine, or can delegate to another IScriptEval for evaluating commands. Methods are also provided for compiling to the substrate and from there to Java.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        command - script to evaluate
        context - script context
        Returns:
        result of script evaluation. Returns null on null input.

        public String invokeMethod(String objectName,
                           String methodName,
                           String[] args)
                    throws ScriptException
        Description copied from interface: IScriptEval
        Invokes object method in the given script engine. See: javax.script.Invocable.
        Specified by:
        invokeMethod in interface IScriptEval
        Parameters:
        objectName - object name
        methodName - method name
        args - parameters
        Returns:
        result of method call, or null if not String
        Throws:
        ScriptException - if script error occurs, if object or method not found, or if ScriptEngine is not Invocable.
